Package kp.company

Interface Company

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EntityManagerCompany, HibernateCompany, SimpleJdbcCompany
    public interface Company
    The high-level kp_spring01 business interface.

    This is basically a data access object. kp_spring01 doesn't have a dedicated business facade.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void deleteDepartment​(int id)
      Deletes a Department from the data store.
      void deleteEmployee​(int id)
      Deletes a Employee from the data store.
      java.util.Collection<Department> findDepartments​(java.lang.String name)
      Retrieve Departments from the data store by name, returning all departments whose name starts with the given name.
      java.util.Collection<Title> getTitles()
      Retrieve all Titles from the data store.
      Department loadDepartment​(int id)
      Retrieve an Department from the data store by id.

      Save a Employee to the data store, either inserting or updating it.

      • getTitles

        java.util.Collection<Title> getTitles()
                               throws org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException

        a Collection of Titles

        org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException

      • findDepartments

        java.util.Collection<Department> findDepartments​(java.lang.String name)
                                          throws org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException
        Retrieve Departments from the data store by name, returning all departments whose name starts with the given name.
        Parameters:
        name - the name to search for
        Returns:
        a Collection of matching Departments (or an empty Collection if none found)
        Throws:
        org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException

      • loadDepartment

        Department loadDepartment​(int id)
                   throws org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException
        Retrieve an Department from the data store by id.
        Parameters:
        id - the id to search for
        Returns:
        the Department if found
        Throws:
        org.springframework.dao.DataRetrievalFailureException - if not found
        org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException
